cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Basic 12 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A spacious room consisting of 6 bunk beds, small lockers for valuables (padlocks available for purchase at reception) and en-suite toilet and shower.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Private room with King size bed, ensuite bathroom, Freeview TV, fridge, Tea/Coffee facilities, heating & aircon.*Please note these rooms are internal and have a small window with no balcony.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

privates.labelDescription: Private room with King size bed, ensuite bathroom, Freeview TV, fridge, Tea/Coffee facilities, shared balcony, heating & aircon & views of Queenstown Gondola. Please note there can be noise from the below vibrant laneway of bars and restaurants.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 4th Oct 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 4th Oct 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
